title: Southern NSW Coastal Escape on Kiama Harbour with Seaside Restaurant & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the allure of New South Wales' southern coast with a stay at this charming seaside retreat on Kiama Harbour, overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Nestled in a region where natural beauty meets vibrant local life, Kiama is a haven for outdoor enthusiasts and those who appreciate the finer things in life.

Savour waterfront dining at the onsite Yves restaurant, featuring a gourmet dinner menu and complimentary daily breakfast. Maintain your routine at the fitness centre and admire the stunning architecture of the heritage-listed bluestone building on the hotel grounds.

Discover the local scene at the Kiama Seaside Markets, the largest in the region, explore pristine beaches, witness the impressive Kiama Blowhole, stroll through historic Terrace shops on the main street or enjoy panoramic views from Saddleback Mountain.
offer_address: 2 Minnamurra Street, Kiama, New South Wales 2533, Australia

title: Coastal Kiama Boutique Hotel Escape with Local Breakfast Basket
description: Discover the charms of coastal town Kiama - just a two-hour drive from Sydney, on the South Coast of New South Wales - at the newest boutique hotel in town: Nova Kiama. Located minutes' walk from Kiama Surf Beach and steps from restaurants and bars, this stylish hotel is your launchpad for this beautiful part of the world. Your escape includes a breakfast basket filled with assorted local produce such as bagels, croissants, fresh fruit, granola and barista coffee, a bottle of wine and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout.
offer_address: 31 Bong Bong St, Kiama NSW 2533 Australia

title: Grand Opening: Coastal Escape in Kiama's Newest Boutique Hotel
description: Discover the charms of coastal town Kiama, on the South Coast of New South Wales, at the newest boutique hotel in town: Nova Kiama. Located minutes' walk from Kiama Surf Beach and steps from restaurants and bars, this stylish hotel is your launchpad for this beautiful part of the world. Your escape includes a hamper filled with local produce and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout.
offer_geo_area_level_2: The Council of the Municipality of Kiama
offer_address: 31 Bong Bong St, Kiama NSW 2533 Australia

title: South Coast NSW Kiama Harbourside Hotel with Restaurant
description:
Escape to harbourside charm at this serene hotel, ideally located in the picturesque seaside town of Kiama. This elegant retreat offers beautifully appointed rooms and a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Plus, tuck into a mouth-watering selection of local produce at Yves bar and bistro as you look out over the Pacific Ocean.

Just a stone's throw away, you'll find the Kiama Blowhole, a natural spectacle that's a must-visit, and the thrilling Jamberoo Action Park. Savour the region's fresh seafood at local eateries, explore the stunning Minnamurra Rainforest, or stroll along the Kiama Coastal Walk for breathtaking ocean views.
offer_address: 2 Minnamurra Street, Kiama, New South Wales 2533, Australia
